*div1 type="summary"* *p*J. Blair to Austin, May 22, 1826. Asking Austin to transmit certain documents to the general government.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Colonel Austin*/person_mentioned*, Will pleas after he shall have Examined the within enclosed documents to envelope them in a New cover and forward them on to the Seate of Government through the propper channel! I would prefer their being transfered from one *person_mentioned*Governor */person_mentioned*to another till they arrive at the*location_mentioned* Seate of Government*/location_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Colonel Austin*/person_mentioned* will oblige me if he will give me every information as to the design of the government in their military operations as relates to the building of garrisons in the *location_mentioned*province of Texas*/location_mentioned* I would wish to Emigrate to that *location_mentioned*province */location_mentioned*if I could place myself in a Cituation that would support me comfortabl, my object in this request is that if the Government was a building I should wish to bring on a Steam Engine and apply it to the Cutting of Lumber for the publick Besides this I want to know what Encouragement you will giv me if I emigrate to *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*I must have some thing that looks enticing or I must embrace other proposals tho not so congenial with my feelings are more to my interest*/p* *p**person_mentioned*J. Blair*/person_mentioned**/p* *p**date_mentioned n="05-22-1826">May 22d 1826*/date_mentioned* */p*
*/div1*
